items.title: 'It's him, it's him!' - Mother spots son deported from US in mega-prison footage
items.description: Some relatives of accused and deported gang members say their sons have been wrongly swept up in a Trump administration crackdown.

items.title: Zelensky says lasting peace achievable this year as he and Trump hail 'positive' call
items.description: The US president says peace efforts are "very much on track", a day after Russia's president declined to agree a full ceasefire.

items.title: Erdogan rival arrested days before becoming presidential candidate
items.description: Protests erupt in the streets of Istanbul after the move, despite a four-day ban on demonstrations.

items.title: UN says worker killed in Gaza as Israeli air strikes resume
items.description: Israel's military denies attacking the Deir al-Balah compound, after the Hamas-run health ministry blamed an Israeli strike.

items.title: Hungary bans LGBTQ+ Pride marches
items.description: The move from Orban's conservative government is the latest in a crackdown on the LGBT community.
